structuredContent.name: BENJAMIN STEIN
structuredContent.summary: Clinical Informatics Specialist with extensive experience in implementing and managing healthcare IT systems, providing support and training, and ensuring seamless integration of technology in clinical settings.

skills.text: Implementation, maintenance, and training of web-based EHR system (Thrive)
Administrative roles within Panorama 9, Verkada, SiPass, Zendesk, IT Glue, Chartnote
On / Off-boarding of office and clinical users
Troubleshooting EMR, Network, Interfaces, PC’s, Hardware, and Web Applications
Creating, modifying, or running reports via TruBridge Report Builder
SAP Business Objects and Discern Analytics

experience.title: Clinical Informatics Specialist
experience.description: Responsible for all systems and technologies used at the hospital. Tasks include implementation, maintenance, and training of EHR system, managing administrative roles, on/off-boarding users, configuring securities, troubleshooting, and providing day-to-day support.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst II
experience.description: Provided 24x7 IT support for clinical staff, managed hardware and OS issues, supported health information systems, and maintained integration engines. Provided remote support and managed tasks within Active Directory, Exchange, and SQL.

experience.title: Clinical Analyst I
experience.description: Supported clinical staff with IT needs, managed virtual A/V servers, and provided advanced technical support.
